EmailTemplate.name: YETI Invoice
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your email!
I have sent the invoice separately. If you do not see it within the next 5-10 minutes, please let me know.
Thank you!
{!User.CommunityNickname} Account Management Team YETI 512.394.0222 sales@yeti.com yeti.com
